xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: intl:translate
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: intl:translate($node as node(), $model as map, $lang as xs:string?, $catalogues as xs:string?) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Template function: calls i18n:process on the child nodes of $node. Template parameters: lang=de Language selection catalogues=relative path Path to the i18n catalogue XML files inside database
